attributes.action: Respect the decision of the majority in the Referendum And leave EU
attributes.additional_details:
Result of the referendum was 51.9% Leave Europe against 48.1% Remain in Europe.
17,410,742 people decide to leave Europe we have to respect this decision, and we have to finish to give false information dictated from who want to stay in this corrupte Europe just for personal interest and not for a real communal interest.
attributes.background:
England went to vote last Thursday 23 June, and the majority took the decision to leave this bureaucratic and corrupte Europe. We have to respect what the people want or what is the meaning of a referendum if after we don't apply what we decide?
Respect this is what we want...this is what we need.
